posts.subject: Druid/pol/ General - #0033B "Lighting the Beacon" edition
posts.body:
==LOYAL LADS OF THE B.O.N.D==

May Cernunnos and our druidic spirit patrons guide the loyal lads of the B.O.N.D to this bunker.

==HAIL CERNUNNOS==
==HAIL SPIRIT PATRONS==
==HAIL TO THE ANCESTORS==
==HAIL TO THE DRUIDS==
==HAIL TO THE B.O.N.D==

Patterns at work within this thread:
ᛊ Sowilo (sun), ᚷ Gifu (gift), ᛁ Isa (ice)

==ALL HAIL THE NEW ORDER==
==AVE DRUIDICVS==
